id-00005.desc: The geth prime releases an emp burst that temporarily disables targeting systems. Each hostile creature within a 30 feet radius has disadvantage on ranged weapon attack rolls until the start of the geth prime's next turn.
id-00005.name: Radar Jamming

id-00001.desc: The geth prime makes a Geth Pulse Rifle attack.
id-00001.name: Geth Pulse Rifle Attack

id-00002.desc: The geth prime activates its radar jamming.
id-00002.name: Activate Radar Jamming (Costs 2 Actions)

id-00003.desc: The geth prime uses its Summon Drone or Summon Geth Turret action.
id-00003.name: Summon Turret or Drone (Costs 3 Actions)

text.p: The geth prime can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The geth prime regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

id-00001.desc: 30 (regen 10)
id-00001.name: Shields

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 3 (1d8 - 1) slashing damage.
id-00001.name: Claw

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range (150ft/450ft), one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) radiant damage.
id-00002.name: Eye Cannon

id-00001.desc:
Level: 1
School: Tech
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: 
Duration: 1 hour
Range: 90 feet

Target a ranged weapon you can see within range and sabotage its internal systems. The next attack made with the target weapon has disadvantage.



Casting sabotage does not break tactical cloak, and creatures are unaware of the casting of this power.



If the weapon is integrated into a synthetic creature, such as an atlas mech's mass accelerator cannon or a drone's particle rifle, this power has no effect unless the creature fails an Intelligence saving throw against your powercasting DC. Whether or not the synthetic creature succeeds on this saving throw, it becomes aware that it has been targeted by a power.
id-00001.name: Sabotage (At will)

id-00001.desc: The geth stalker's innate powercasting ability is Intelligence (power save DC 11, +3 to hit with power attacks). It can innately cast the below powers.
id-00001.name: Innate Spellcasting

id-00002.desc: Once per turn, the geth stalker can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to one creature it hits with an attack if it has advantage on the attack roll. The attack must be made with a melee or ranged weapon.
id-00002.name: Assassination

id-00003.desc: If the geth stalker subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.
id-00003.name: Avoidance

id-00004.desc: The geth stalker can leap up to one half its speed.
id-00004.name: Leap

id-00005.desc: The geth stalker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
id-00005.name: Spider Climb

id-00001.desc: The geth trooper makes two Geth Pulse Rifle attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
id-00002.name: Weapon Strike

id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range (120ft/360ft), one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) radiant damage.
id-00003.name: Geth Pulse Rifle (burst-fire, two-handed)

id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range (50ft/150ft), one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) radiant damage.
id-00001.name: Pulse Cannon

id-00002.desc: The geth turret restores 9 (2d8) shield points to a friendly creature within 10 feet.
id-00002.name: Shield Restore (Recharge 5-6)

id-00001.desc: 5 (regen 5)
id-00001.name: Shields

id-00001.desc: The guardian makes two M-358 Talon attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
id-00002.name: Stun Baton

id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range (25ft/75ft), one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.
id-00003.name: M-358 Talon (double-tap)

id-00001.desc: While the guardian has their Heavy Shield equipped, it gains +2 AC and has resistance bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
id-00001.name: Heavy Shield

id-00001.desc: The harvester can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its acid spit and two with its stomp.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +14 to hit, reach 10ft, one target. Hit: 15 (2d6 + 8) piercing damage.
id-00002.name: Stomp

id-00003.desc: The harvester targets a 15-foot radius within 150 feet and launches a glob of acid that coats the area. Each creature within the area must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. Until the end of the harvester's next turn, each creature that enters the area or ends its turn there must also make the saving throw.
id-00003.name: Acid Spit

id-00001.desc: The harvester makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
id-00001.name: Detect

id-00002.desc: The harvester makes a stomp attack.
id-00002.name: Stomp Attack

id-00003.desc: The harvester moves 30 feet in a straight line, moving over Large or smaller creatures in its path. Each creature caught in its path must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (2d6 + 8) piercing damage and be knocked prone. The harvester cannot move through a Huge or larger creature.
id-00003.name: Trample Attack (Costs 2 Actions)

text.p: The harvester can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The harvester regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

id-00001.desc: Each creature of the harvester's choice that is within 150 feet of the harvester and aware of it must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the harvester's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
id-00001.name: Frightful Presence

id-00002.desc: If the harvester is within a region that contains Klixen, it begins the fight by dropping 1d10 Klixen in a 15-foot by 50-foot area.
id-00002.name: Drop Klixen

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 10 (3d4 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
id-00001.name: Gore

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage. Miss: Hit or miss, if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone and is grappled. A creature takes half damage on a successful saving throw..
id-00002.name: Maul

id-00003.desc: Each other kath hound within 60 feet that is not incapacitated gains +2 Dexterity and +1 Wisdom for 1 minute. Kath hounds can only benefit from one Howl at a time.
id-00003.name: Howl

id-00001.desc: The kath hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
id-00001.name: Keen Hearing and Smell

id-00002.desc: The kath hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kath hound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
id-00002.name: Pack Tactics

id-00003.desc: The kath hound has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.
id-00003.name: Grappler

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage. A creature that is grappled by the husk takes 11 (3d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of the husk's turns.
id-00001.name: Swipe

id-00001.desc: As a bonus action, the husk can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.
id-00001.name: Aggressive

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
id-00001.name: Bite

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage. Miss: Hit or miss, if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone and is grappled. A creature takes half damage on a successful saving throw.
id-00002.name: Maul

id-00001.desc: The kath hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
id-00001.name: Keen Hearing and Smell

id-00002.desc: The kath hound has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kath hound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
id-00002.name: Pack Tactics

id-00003.desc: The kath hound has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.
id-00003.name: Grappler

id-00001.desc: The brood warrior makes two Impale attacks or attempts to grapple a creature and makes an Impale attack.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range (50ft/150ft), one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) acid damage and 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. This damage bypasses shields.
id-00002.name: Acid Spit

id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10ft, one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage and 5 (1d10) acid damage.
id-00003.name: Impale

id-00001.desc:
Level: 2
School: Biotic
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Primes: Force
Duration: Concentration, up to one minute
Range: 90 feet

Lock a target in a high-gravity mass effect field. Choose a creature you can see within range. The creature must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is paralyzed, primed: force, and has resistance to all damage for the duration of the power. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Strength saving throw. On a success, the power ends. A detonating attack immediately ends the power.
id-00001.name: Stasis (3/day)

id-00002.desc:
Level: 2
School: Biotic
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Primes: Necrotic
Duration: Instant
Range: 120 feet

Make a ranged spell attack on an organic creature you can see within range. On a hit, you generate a rapidly shifting mass effect field inside the target dealing 3d10 necrotic damage. In addition, the target is primed: necrotic until the end of your next turn. This damage bypasses shields.



At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 2d10 for each slot level above the 2nd.
id-00002.name: Warp (5/day)

id-00001.desc: As an action or bonus action, the rachni brood warrior gains 5 barrier ticks. When the rachni brood warrior is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00001.name: Barrier (3/day)

id-00002.desc: The rachni brood warrior's innate powercasting ability is Wisdom (power save DC 12, +4 to hit with power attacks). It can innately cast the below powers.
id-00002.name: Innate Spellcasting

id-00003.desc: The rachni brood warrior has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.
id-00003.name: Grappler

id-00001.desc: The klixen exhales a 6-meter cone of fire. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
id-00001.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 6)

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage and 3 (1d4 + 1) fire damage.
id-00002.name: Pincer

id-00001.desc: When the klixen dies, it explodes in a burst of lava. Each creature within 5 feet of it must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
id-00001.name: Death Burst

id-00002.desc: A creature that touches the klixen or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) fire damage.
id-00002.name: Heated Body

id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range (10ft/30ft), one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage.
id-00001.name: M-4 Shuriken (hip-fire, burst-fire)

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range (60ft/180ft), one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
id-00002.name: M-3 Predator (double-tap)

id-00001.desc:
Level: 1
School: Tech
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Primes: Lightning
Duration: Instant
Range: 5 feet

Send an electric shock from your omni-tool to a creature you try to touch. Make a melee spell attack against the target. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor. On a hit, the target becomes primed: lightning until the end of your next turn and takes 1d6 lightning damage. Then the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or become stunned until the end of your next turn. A target with at least 1 shield point has advantage on this saving throw.
id-00001.name: Shocking Grasp (5/day)

id-00001.desc: The loki mech's innate powercasting ability is Intelligence (power save DC 9, +1 to hit with power attacks). It can innately cast the below powers.
id-00001.name: Innate Spellcasting

id-00002.desc: The LOKI mech can be programmed with pre-recorded phrases, which it utters occasionally during combat. Each hostile creature that hears the phrase must pass a Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature becomes unnerved by the phrase and can only target the LOKI mech when making attack rolls or using damaging powers. On a success, a creature is unaffected and is immune to the LOKI mech's Chatter. The DC of the saving throw is dependant on the phrase, but cannot be higher than 12.
id-00002.name: Chatter (variant)

id-00003.desc: The LOKI mech is incapable of complex combat tactics. It never seeks cover and cannot take the Hide, Dodge, Help, or Disengage actions.
id-00003.name: Limited Tactics

id-00004.desc: When the LOKI mech is reduced to 0 hit points, it self-destructs. Each creature within a 5-foot-radius sphere must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or take 5 (2d4) thunder damage.
id-00004.name: Post-mortem Explosion

id-00001.desc: The marauder makes 2 Phaeston attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range (60ft/180ft), one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.
id-00002.name: Phaeston (burst-fire, two-handed)

id-00003.desc: The marauder coats a friendly husk, abomination, or cannibal in a scab-like armor plating, increasing the target's AC by 2.
id-00003.name: Create Armor Plating (Recharge 5-6)

id-00001.desc: 15 (regen 15)
id-00001.name: Shields

id-00001.desc: The N7 demolisher makes three weapon attacks or two weapon attacks and uses one grenade.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range (60ft/180ft), one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.
id-00002.name: N7 Eagle (burst-fire)

id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range (15ft/45ft), one target. Hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) piercing damage.
id-00003.name: N7 Hurricane (hip-fire, burst-fire)

id-00004.desc: The N7 demolisher deploys a Shield Pylon to an unoccupied space within 5 feet. The pylon has AC 10, 25 hit points and provides half cover. At the end of the N7 demolisher's turn, any friendly creature within 10 feet of the pylon gains 2 shield points. Shield points gained this way cannot exceed the creatures maximum shield points.
id-00004.name: Deploy Shield Pylon (1/Day)

id-00005.desc: The N7 demolisher uses its action to repair a friendly, synthetic target within 5 feet for 2d8 hit points.
id-00005.name: Repair

id-00001.desc: 20 (regen 10)
id-00001.name: Shields

id-00002.desc:
The N7 demolisher has the following grenades equipped. It can use a grenade as an action.
3 uses: Arc Grenade III, Homing Grenade I:

Arc Grenade III:

Target an area within 30 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of the target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 3d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Homing Grenade I:

Target a creature you can see within 30 feet. The target creature suffers thunder damage. Each other creature within 5 feet of the target must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature suffers 1d6 thunder damage or half as much on a successful one.
id-00002.name: Grenades

id-00003.desc: The N7 demolisher has advantage on its first attack roll each turn.
id-00003.name: N7 Training

id-00001.desc: The N7 Paladin makes two N7 Hurricane attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range (15ft/45ft), one target. Hit: 11 (3d6 + 1) piercing damage.
id-00002.name: N7 Hurricane (hip-fire, burst-fire)

id-00001.desc:
Level: 1
School: Tech
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Primes: Fire, Detonates
Duration: Instant
Range: 120 feet

Hurl a high-explosive, plasma round at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target is primed: fire until the end of your next turn and takes 2d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this power ignites if it isn't being worn or carried.



At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 2d10 for each slot level above 1st.
id-00001.name: Incinerate (At will)

id-00002.desc:
Level: 1
School: Tech
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Detonates
Duration: Instant
Range: 150 feet

Cycle your omni-tool, sapping electromagnetic energy from a creature you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 3d6 lightning damage, and you regain shield points equal to half the amount of lightning damage dealt.



At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.
id-00002.name: Energy Drain (3/day)

id-00003.desc:
Level: 4
School: Tech
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: 
Duration: Instant
Range: 90 feet

Launch a globe of supercooled helium. Make a ranged power attack on a target within range, choosing a location on its body. The location can be body, legs, or head.



Legs. +2 bonus to hit. The target is restrained for the next minute. Any creature can use its action to make a Strength check against your power save DC to try and break the ice. On a success, the affected creature is freed but suffers 8d4 bludgeoning damage.



Body. On a hit, the target takes 8d8 cold damage.



Head (Large or smaller creature). -5 penalty to hit. The creature becomes blinded and deafened for the next minute. Any creature can use an action to make a Strength check against your power save DC to and break the ice. On a success, the affected creature is freed but suffers 8d12 bludgeoning damage.
id-00003.name: Snap Freeze (3/day)

id-00001.desc: 20 (regen 10)
id-00001.name: Shields

id-00002.desc: As an action or bonus action, the N7 paladin gains 5 barrier ticks. When the N7 paladin is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00002.name: Barrier (1/Day)

id-00003.desc: As a bonus action, the N7 Paladin deploys its omni-shield, lasting 1 minute. While the shield is deployed, the N7 Paladin gains +2 AC and can make a melee weapon attack with the shield: +5 to hit, 5 feet reach, 1d12 bludgeoning damage.
id-00003.name: Omni-Shield (1/Day)

id-00004.desc: Gain all the benefits of Omni-Shield. In addition, targets hit by the Fire-Shield take 3d10 fire damage. This damage detonates primed targets, but the N7 Paladin is immune to any detonating effects.
id-00004.name: Variant: Fire-Shield (1/Day)

id-00005.desc: Gain all the benefits of Omni-Shield. In addition, a creature hit by the Cryo-Shield take 1d8 cold damage and must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or become Frozen until the end its next turn.
id-00005.name: Variant: Cryo-Shield (1/Day)

id-00006.desc: The N7 paladin's innate powercasting ability is Wisdom (power save DC 14, +6 to hit with power attacks). It can innately cast the below powers.
id-00006.name: Innate Spellcasting

id-00007.desc: The N7 Paladin has advantage on its first attack roll each turn.
id-00007.name: N7 Training

id-00001.desc: The N7 Shadow makes three monomolecular blade attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage.
id-00002.name: Monomolecular Blade

id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range (500ft/1500ft), one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) piercing damage.
id-00003.name: M-97 Viper (two-handed, double-tap)

id-00001.desc:
Level: 3
School: Tech
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Detonates
Duration: Instant
Range: Self (20-foot cone)

Fabricate an electrified whip that lashes out in front of you in an 20-foot cone. Each creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 8d6 lightning damage or half as much damage on a successful one.
id-00001.name: Electric Slash (4/day)

id-00001.desc: 20 (regen 10)
id-00001.name: Shields

id-00002.desc: As a bonus action, the N7 Shadow activates its tactical cloak, becoming invisible for 1 minute. When the N7 Shadow makes a melee or ranged attack or uses a tech or combat power, tactical cloak ends.
id-00002.name: Tactical Cloak (3/Day)

id-00003.desc: The N7 shadow's innate powercasting ability is Intelligence (power save DC 14, +6 to hit with power attacks). It can innately cast the below powers.
id-00003.name: Innate Spellcasting

id-00004.desc: During its first turn, the N7 Shadow has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the N7 Shadow scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.
id-00004.name: Assassinate

id-00005.desc: If the N7 Shadow is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the N7 Shadow instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.
id-00005.name: Evasion

id-00006.desc: The N7 Shadow has advantage on its first attack roll each turn.
id-00006.name: N7 Training

id-00007.desc: Once per turn, the N7 Shadow deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the N7 Shadow that isn't incapacitated and the N7 Shadow doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.
id-00007.name: Sneak Attack

id-00001.desc: The N7 Slayer makes three monomolecular blade attacks or two N7 Piranha attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.
id-00002.name: Monomolecular Blade

id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range (10ft/20ft), one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage.
id-00003.name: N7 Piranha (two-handed, hip-fire)

id-00001.desc: The N7 Slayer adds 3 to its AC against one melee that would hit it. To do so, it must be able to see the target and be wielding a melee weapon. If the attack misses, the N7 Slayer can make one melee attack against the attacker if it is within its reach.
id-00001.name: Parry and Counter

id-00001.desc:
Level: 0
School: Biotic
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Detonates
Duration: Instant
Range: 40 feet

Choose a creature or object within range and use the target's mass to pull yourself to its location with incredible force (this movement does not provoke opportunity attacks). The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save the target takes 1d10 force damage and falls prone. Charge ignores half cover.



The damage increases by 1d10 when you reach the 5th level (2d10), 11th level (3d10) and 17th level (4d10).
id-00001.name: Charge - Cantrip

id-00002.desc:
Level: 0
School: Biotic
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Detonates
Duration: Instant
Range: 120 feet

You focus the energy of your barrier into a high-powered beam at a target creature or object within range. Remove 1 barrier tick and make a ranged spell attack on that target. On a hit, the creature takes 3d4 force damage.



You may use additional barrier ticks to create more than one beam at higher levels: two beams at 5th level, three beams at 11th level, and four beams at 17th level. You can direct the beams at the same target or at different ones. Make a separate attack roll for each beam.
id-00002.name: Phase Disruptor - Cantrip

id-00003.desc:
Level: 1
School: Biotic
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Components: Detonates
Duration: Concentration, up to one minute
Range: Self

The next time you hit a creature with a melee weapon attack during the power's duration, increase the density of the weapon dealing an extra 2d8 force damage to the target. This damage detonates primed targets.



At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage dealt by the attack increases by 2d8 for each slot above the 1st.
id-00003.name: Biotic Slash - 1st level

id-00001.desc: 15 (regen 5)
id-00001.name: Shields

id-00002.desc: As an action or bonus action, the N7 slayer gains 5 barrier ticks. When the N7 slayer is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00002.name: Barrier (2/Day)

id-00003.desc: The N7 slayer is a 9th-level powercaster. Its powercasting ability is Wisdom (power save DC 13, +5 to hit with powers). The N7 slayer has the below powers.
id-00003.name: Spellcasting

id-00004.desc: As a bonus action, the N7 Slayer can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.
id-00004.name: Aggressive

id-00005.desc: If the N7 Slayer is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.
id-00005.name: Avoidance

id-00006.desc: The N7 Slayer has advantage on its first attack roll each turn.
id-00006.name: N7 Training

id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range (300ft/900ft), one target. Hit: 18 (2d12 + 5) piercing damage.
id-00001.name: M-98 Widow (two-handed)

id-00001.desc: 20 (regen 10)
id-00001.name: Shields

id-00002.desc: The nemesis has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the nemesis's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
id-00002.name: Pack Tactics

id-00003.desc: When the nemesis dies, it explodes. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
id-00003.name: Self-Destruct

id-00004.desc: While in dim light or darkness, the nemesis can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
id-00004.name: Shadow Cloak

id-00005.desc: If the nemesis surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.
id-00005.name: Surprise Attack

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 25ft, one target. Hit: 15 (4d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.
id-00001.name: Crush

id-00002.desc: The oculus fires a persistent particle beam that is 60 feet long and 5 feet wide that lasts until the start of the oculus's next turn. While firing the beam, the oculus's speed becomes 0. Each creature that is within the beam's path or that moves into the beam's path for the first time on its turn must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 66 (12d10) radiant damage, or half as much on a successful save.
id-00002.name: Particle Beam

id-00065.conditionimmunities: Blinded, Deafened, Frightened, Lifted, Paralyzed, Poisoned, Prone
id-00065.name: Oculus

id-00001.desc: The phantom makes three Monomolecular Blade attacks or one Palm Blaster attack and two Monomolecular Blade (one-handed) attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 11 (1d10 + 6) slashing damage.
id-00002.name: Monomolecular Blade

id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range (10ft/30ft), one target. Hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) thunder damage.
id-00003.name: Palm Blaster

id-00001.desc: As an action or bonus action, the phantom gains 8 barrier ticks. When the phantom is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00001.name: Barrier (3/Day)

id-00002.desc: As a bonus action, the phantom can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.
id-00002.name: Aggressive

id-00003.desc: If the phantom subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.
id-00003.name: Avoidance

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.
id-00001.name: Bite

id-00001.desc: The pyjak has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the pyjak's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
id-00001.name: Pack Tactics

id-00001.desc:
The kett chosen has the following grenades equipped. It can use a grenade as an action.

2 uses: frag grenade III:

Target an area within 30 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of the target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d12 piercing damage or half as much damage on a successful one.

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range (20ft/60ft), one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage.
id-00002.name: M-25 Hornet (double-tap, hip-fire, burst-fire)

id-00001.desc:
The assault trooper has the following grenades equipped. It can use a grenade as an action.

Target an area within 30 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of the target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d12 piercing damage or half as much damage on a successful one.

id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range (50ft/150ft), one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

id-00004.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5ft, one organic creature that is grappled by the weakened adjutant, incapacitated, or restrained. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage and 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken.
id-00004.name: Reaper Infection

id-00001.desc: The weakened adjutant has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.
id-00001.name: Grappler

id-00001.desc: The rachni queen makes one bite attack and two impale attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10ft, one target. Hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) piercing damage.
id-00002.name: Bite

id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 20ft, one target. Hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) piercing damage.
id-00003.name: Impale

id-00001.desc: The rachni queen summons 1d10 + 3 rachni workers. These arrive at the beginning of the queen's next turn and take their turn on the queen's initiative.
id-00001.name: Summon Workers

id-00002.desc: The rachni queen summons 1d6 + 1 rachni soldiers. These arrive at the beginning of the queen's next turn and take their turn on the queen's initiative.
id-00002.name: Summon Soldiers

id-00003.desc: The rachni queen summons one rachni brood warrior. It arrives at the beginning of the queen's next turn and takes its turn on the queen's initiative.
id-00003.name: Summon Brood Warriors

text.p: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the rachni queen takes a lair action to cause one of the Lair Action effects; it can't use the same effect two rounds in a row.

id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range (50ft/150ft), one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) acid damage and 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage. This damage bypasses shields.
id-00001.name: Acid Spit

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) acid damage.
id-00002.name: Impale

id-00001.name: Ambusher

id-00002.desc: The rachni soldier has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.
id-00002.name: Grappler

id-00001.desc: The rachni worker spits acid at one target within 30 feet or two targets within 30 feet if both targets are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 3 (1d6) acid damage.
id-00001.name: Acid Splash (Recharge 4-6)

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) piercing damage.
id-00002.name: Bite

id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range (10ft/20ft), one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.
id-00003.name: M-23 Katana (two-handed, hip-fire)

id-00001.desc: As a bonus action, the rampart mech generates a 5 feet tall and wide, hexagon-shaped shield with 5AC and 50 shield points which offers full-cover. Hex shield can be found in the NPC list.
id-00001.name: Hex Shield (1/Day)

id-00002.desc: As a bonus action, the rampart mech activates its tactical cloak, becoming invisible for 1 minute. When the rampart mech makes a melee or ranged attack or uses a tech or combat power, tactical cloak ends.
id-00002.name: Tactical Cloak (1/Day)

id-00003.desc: As a bonus action, the rampart mech can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.
id-00003.name: Aggressive

id-00004.desc: When the rampart mech dies, it vents excess heat from its weapon and armor in a 5 feet radius until the start of its next turn. Each creature that enters the radius for the first time or ends its turn there takes 18 (4d8) radiant damage.
id-00004.name: Post-Mortem Vent

id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range (150ft/450ft), one target. Hit: 14 (3d10 - 2) piercing damage and 14 (3d10 - 2) radiant damage. The YMIR mech can make a burst fire attack instead.
id-00001.name: Mass Accelerator Machinegun

id-00002.desc: The YMIR mech targets an area within 150 feet. Each creature within 15 feet of the target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 (8d12) thunder damage or half as much damage on a successful one.
id-00002.name: Rocket Launcher (Recharge 5-6)

id-00001.desc: When the YMIR mech is reduced to 0 hit points, it self-destructs. Each creature within a 15-foot-radius sphere must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 (4d10) thunder damage or half as much on a successful one.
id-00001.name: Post-mortem Explosion

id-00001.desc: The agent makes 2 attacks with its Scorpion.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range (60ft/180ft), one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) thunder damage.
id-00002.name: Scorpion (double-tap)

id-00003.desc: As an action, the agent detonates its active Decoy. Each creature within 10 feet of the decoy must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d6 thunder damage or half as much on a successful one.
id-00003.name: Explosive Decoy

id-00001.desc:
Level: 1
School: Tech
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: 
Duration: 1 minute
Range: 30 feet

Summon a holographic copy of yourself at a location within range. Until the power ends, the decoy moves with you and mimics your actions. You can use your action to dismiss the decoy. Each time a creature targets you with an attack during the power's duration, it must first make a Wisdom (Perception) check. On a failure, a creature attacks the decoy. On a success, the creature ignores the decoy, attacks you, and no longer needs to pass the Wisdom check to target you.
id-00001.name: Decoy (3/day)

id-00002.desc:
Level: 2
School: Tech
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Primes: Lightning
Duration: Instant
Range: 120 feet

Unleash an electrostatic discharge at a creature or object within range. Three bolts then leap from that target to as many as three other targets, each of which must be within 15 feet of the first target. A target can be a creature or an object and can be targeted by only one of the bolts.



A target becomes primed: lightning until the start of your next turn and must make a Dexterity saving throw. The target takes 5d6 lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
id-00002.name: Overload (5/day)

id-00001.desc: 10 (regen 5)
id-00001.name: Shields

id-00002.desc: The salarian stg agent's innate powercasting ability is Intelligence (power save DC 12, +4 to hit with power attacks). It can innately cast the below powers.
id-00002.name: Innate Spellcasting

id-00003.desc:
The salarian stg agent has the following grenades equipped. It can use a grenade as an action.

Flashbang Grenade III:

Target an area within 30 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is blinded until the end of your next turn.
id-00003.name: Grenades

id-00004.desc: If the agent surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

id-00002.name: M-4 Shuriken (hip-fire, burst-fire)

id-00001.desc:
Level: 0
School: Combat
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Detonates
Duration: Instant
Range: Self

Whenever you make a ranged weapon attack, you can expend a concussive shot charge to load a specialized thermal clip into the weapon. When you do so, the ranged attack gains advantage. If the attack is successful, it deals an additional 1d8 bludgeoning damage and medium-sized or smaller creatures must pass a Strength saving throw (DC 8 + proficiency bonus + DEX modifier) or become prone.



You have 3 charges of Concussive Shot. You regain all of your charges when you finish a short rest.
id-00001.name: Concussive Shot (5/day)

id-00001.desc: 5 (regen 5)
id-00001.name: Shields

id-00002.name: Innate Spellcasting

id-00003.desc: If the sniper surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.
id-00003.name: Surprise Attack

id-00001.name: Defibrillators

id-00002.desc: The repair drone can stabilize a friendly creature within 5 feet.
id-00002.name: Stabilize (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

id-00001.desc:
Level: 1
School: Tech
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: 
Duration: Instant
Range: Touch

Inject a friendly, organic creature with nanobots that reduce pain and heal internal injuries. The creature gains hit points equal to 1d8 + your spellcasting ability modifier.
id-00001.name: First Aid (3/day)

id-00001.desc: 5 (regen 5)
id-00001.name: Shields

id-00002.desc: The repair drone's innate powercasting ability is Intelligence (power save DC 10, +2 to hit with power attacks). It can innately cast the below powers.
id-00002.name: Innate Spellcasting

id-00001.desc: The thresher maw can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes four attacks: one with its grasp, two with its tail, one with its acid spit. It can use its Swallow instead of its grasp.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 10ft, one target. Hit: 29 (3d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage and 23 (2d12 + 10) acid damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 22).
id-00002.name: Grasp

id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +18 to hit, reach 20ft, one target. Hit: 24 (4d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 22 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
id-00003.name: Tail

id-00004.desc: The thresher maw targets a 15-foot radius within 150 feet. Each creature within the area must succeed on a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.
id-00004.name: Acid Spit

id-00005.desc: The thresher maw makes one grasp attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the grasp's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the thresher maw, and it takes 56 (16d6) acid damage at the start of each of the thresher maw's turns. If the thresher maw takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the thresher maw must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the thresher maw. If the thresher maw dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting prone.
id-00005.name: Swallow

id-00083.damageresistances: Acid, Bludgeoning, Cold, Fire, Force, Lightning, Piercing, Poison, Slashing

id-00001.desc: The thresher maw moves up to half its speed.
id-00001.name: Move

id-00002.desc: The thresher maw makes a tail attack.
id-00002.name: Tail Attack

id-00003.desc: The thresher maw makes an acid spit attack.
id-00003.name: Acid Spit Attack (Costs 2 Actions)

id-00083.name: Thresher Maw

text.p: The thresher maw can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options listed. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The thresher maw regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

id-00001.desc: If the thresher maw fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
id-00001.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

id-00002.desc: When the thresher maw moves via burrowing, the ground it moves through becomes difficult terrain.
id-00002.name: Destroy Terrain

id-00003.desc: Each creature of the thresher maw's choice that is within 150 feet of the name and aware of it must succeed on a DC 22 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the thresher maw's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.
id-00003.name: Frightful Presence

id-00004.desc: The thresher maw deals double damage to objects and structures.
id-00004.name: Siege Monster

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
id-00001.name: Bite

id-00001.desc: The varren has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
id-00001.name: Keen Hearing and Smell

id-00002.desc: The varren has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the varren's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
id-00002.name: Pack Tactics

id-00001.desc: The thorian targets one creature within 300 feet of it that it or one of its controllers, thralls, or creepers can see. That creature must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or suffer a level of indoctrination.
id-00001.name: Indoctrinate

id-00002.desc: The thorian summons a thrall to its aid. It arrives on initiative count 20 somewhere along the thorian's root structure.
id-00002.name: Summon Thrall

id-00001.desc: The thorian sprouts 1d12 + 3 thorian spawn. These spawn can appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of any part of the thorian's root structure. The spawn take their turn at the end of the thorian's turn.
id-00001.name: Summon Spawns

id-00002.desc: The thorian summons 1d8 + 4 thorian creepers. These creepers can appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of any part of the thorian's root structure. The creepers take their turn at the end of the thorian's turn.
id-00002.name: Summon Creepers

id-00003.desc: The thorian summons 1d4 thorian controllers. These controllers can appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of any part of the thorian's root structure. The controllers take their turn at the end of the thorian's turn.
id-00003.name: Summon Controllers

text.p: On initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), the thorian takes a lair action to cause one of the lair action effects; it can't use the same effect two rounds in a row.

id-00001.desc: Unless a thorian controller is incapacitated, it is a source of indoctrination to all creatures within 1 feet of it. See the indoctrination condition.
id-00001.name: Indoctrination

id-00002.desc: One a thorian reaches maturity, it's roots grow at a rate of 5 to 10 feet per year. Over time, these roots create vast tunnel systems and caverns that act as the thorian's lair.
id-00002.name: Root Structure

id-00003.desc: The thorian has 4 + 1d4 neural nodes located along its root structure, spread throughout its lair. At start of its turn, the thorian gains 2d12 points for each remaining neural node. Each node has AC 10 and 30 (6d6 + 10) hit points.
id-00003.name: Neural Nodes

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
id-00001.name: Bite

id-00001.desc: The varren has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
id-00001.name: Keen Hearing and Smell

id-00002.desc: The varren has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the varren's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
id-00002.name: Pack Tactics

id-00001.desc: The yahg makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.
id-00002.name: Bite

id-00003.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10ft, one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.
id-00003.name: Claw

id-00087.name: Yahg
id-00087.skills: Acrobatics +4, Athletics +7, Deception +3, Insight +6, Perception +6, Stealth +4

id-00001.desc: During its first turn, the yahg has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the yahg scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.
id-00001.name: Assassinate

id-00002.desc: If the yahg subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.
id-00002.name: Avoidance

id-00003.desc: The yahg deals an extra 13 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the yahg that isn't incapacitated and the yahg doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.
id-00003.name: Sneak Attack

id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, range (60ft/180ft), one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.
id-00001.name: M-3 Predator (double-tap)

id-00001.desc: The ravager makes two twin artillery cannon attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: The ravager spits acid in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in the area must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
id-00002.name: Acid Splash (Recharge 5-6)

id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range (150ft/450ft), one target. Hit: 18 (3d10 + 2) piercing damage and 12 (3d6 + 2) acid damage.
id-00003.name: Twin Artillery Cannons

id-00001.desc: If the ravager takes piercing or slashing damage that is not from the result of a critical hit one of its egg sacs explodes, releasing 1d10 swarmers.
id-00001.name: Egg Sacs

id-00001.desc: The reaper harvester makes two harvester cannon attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: The reaper harvester targets a location within 90 feet. Each creature within a 15 feet radius must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 3d10 force and 3d10 thunder damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.
id-00002.name: Harvester Cannon

id-00001.desc: The reaper harvester makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
id-00001.name: Detect

id-00002.desc: The reaper harvester makes a harvester cannon attack.
id-00002.name: Harvester Cannon Attack (Costs 2 Actions)

id-00003.desc: The reaper harvester releases 1d10 Husks from its body.
id-00003.name: Spawn Husks (Costs 3 Actions)

text.p: The reaper harvester can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The reaper harvester regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
id-00001.name: Bash

id-00002.desc: The scion targets three locations within 90 feet and launches an explosive blast to each. The locations can be the same or different. Each creature within a 15 feet radius of a target location must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 15 (3d10) thunder damage or half as much on a successful one.
id-00002.name: Salvo (Recharge 4-6)

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) acid damage. On a hit, the swarmer explodes (its hit points immediately become 0 after resolving the attack).
id-00001.name: Suicide Attack

id-00001.desc: As a bonus action, the swarmer can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.
id-00001.name: Aggressive

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.
id-00001.name: Slash

id-00002.desc: The creeper regurgitates acid in a 4-meter cone. A creature within the code must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (4d6) acid damage.
id-00002.name: Acid Vomit (Recharge 4-6)

text.p: These creatures act as the eyes, ears, and mouth of the Thorian, issuing its commands while also informing on its enemies.

id-00001.desc: The controller resembles a Thorian creeper. A creature that can see the controller can discern its true nature with a successful DC 15 Intelligence (Science) or Intelligence (Investigation) check.
id-00001.name: Creeper Resemblance

id-00002.desc: The controller gains a +1 bonus to its attack and damage rolls, ability checks, and saving throws for each creature within 60 feet of it that has the Hive Mind feature. This bonus cannot exceed +5.
id-00002.name: Hive Mind Overseer

id-00003.desc: Unless a thorian controller is incapacitated, it is a source of indoctrination to all creatures within 250 feet of it. See the indoctrination condition.
id-00003.name: Indoctrination

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) slashing damage.
id-00001.name: Slash

id-00002.desc: The creeper regurgitates acid in a 4-meter cone. A creature within the cone must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) acid damage.
id-00002.name: Acid Vomit (Recharge 4-6)

id-00001.desc: If the creeper is within 60 feet of a Thorian Controller, it gains +1 to attack and damage rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.
id-00001.name: Hive Mind

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
id-00001.name: Bite

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range (25ft/75ft), one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) necrotic damage.
id-00002.name: Acid Spit

id-00003.desc: The nymph releases spores in a 10-foot-radius sphere lasting until the end of its next turn. A creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 3 (1d6) psychic damage and must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature becomes paralyzed until the start of its next turn.
id-00003.name: Release Spores (1/Day)

text.p: In its juvenile stage, the Thorian becomes mobile and sneaks aboard unknowing ships to spread across the galaxy.

id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range (25ft/75ft), one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) necrotic damage.
id-00001.name: Acid Spit

id-00002.desc: The spawn releases spores in a 10 feet-radius sphere lasting until the end of its next turn. A creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 3 (1d6) psychic damage and must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature becomes paralyzed until the start of its next turn.
id-00002.name: Release Spores (1/Day)

id-00001.desc: The spawn in rooted in the ground and cannot be moved. It automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws and skill checks.
id-00001.name: Rooted

id-00001.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range (60ft/180ft), one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.
id-00001.name: M-3 Predator (double-tap)

text.p: The poor slaves of the Thorian, they act as the reminder of the dangers of the frontier. Kill the Thorian to end their suffering.

id-00001.desc: If the creeper is within 60 feet of a Thorian Controller, it gains +1 to attack and damage rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.
id-00001.name: Hive Mind

id-00002.desc: The thrall loses all levels of indoctrination reverts to its normal self if the controlling Thorian dies.
id-00002.name: Enslaved Mind

id-00003.desc: Thralls can be any organic humanoid with an intelligence of 4 or greater. Instead, you may use the stat block of a randomly generated grunt or other organic humanoid from the bestiary.
id-00003.name: Random Thrall (variant)

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
id-00001.name: Maul

id-00001.desc: Rather than wearing armor, the Synthetic beast has an armor type of choice. (See Geth for rules on this.) Medium and Heavy armor do not have their strength requirements. The Synthetic beast has an amount of mod slots equal to the Tracker's PB.
id-00001.name: Custom Armor

id-00002.desc: Due to their inherent customization, you may choose 1 Training Regimen from the list. It may not have a level requirement, and you must fulfill all other requirements as usual.
id-00002.name: Custom Frame

id-00001.desc: The collector assassin makes two Particle Rifle attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 7 (2d6) slashing damage.
id-00002.name: Claw

id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range (25ft/75ft), one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) radiant damage.
id-00003.name: Particle Rifle (burst-fire, two-handed)

id-00001.desc: The collector assassin has 4 barrier ticks. When it is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00001.name: Barrier

id-00002.desc: When the collector assassin is possessed by a harbinger it gains temporary hit points equal to its total hit points and 6 barrier ticks. While it has barrier ticks it also gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

id-00001.desc: The collector captain makes two Collector Assault Rifle attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range (60ft/180ft), one target. Hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) piercing damage.

id-00003.desc: For 1 minute, the collector captain can utter a special command or warning whenever a non-hostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a d4 to its role provided it can hear and understand the collector captain. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the collector captain is incapacitated.
id-00003.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

id-00004.desc: The collector captain summons 1d4 seeker swarms at an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet.
id-00004.name: Summon Seeker Swarm (Recharge 5-6)

id-00001.desc: The collector captain has 6 barrier ticks. When it is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00001.name: Barrier

id-00002.desc: The collector captain has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the collector captain's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
id-00002.name: Pack Tactics

id-00003.desc: When the captain is possessed by a harbinger it gains temporary hit points equal to its total hit points and 8 barrier ticks. While it has barrier ticks it also gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. Instead of summoning a seeker swarm, it summons a seeker plague.
id-00003.name: Possessed Captain

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.
id-00001.name: Weapon Bash

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range (60ft/180ft), one target. Hit: 10 (4d4) piercing damage.
id-00002.name: Collector Assault Rifle (burst-fire, two-handed)

id-00001.desc: The collector drone has 0 barrier ticks. When it is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00001.name: Barrier

id-00002.desc: When the collector drone is possessed by a harbinger it gains temporary hit points equal to its total hit points and 4 barrier ticks. While it has barrier ticks it also gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
id-00002.name: Possessed Collector

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 13 (3d8) bludgeoning damage.
id-00001.name: Bash

id-00001.desc: The collector general makes one bash attack.
id-00001.name: Bash Attack

id-00002.desc: The harbinger targets a friendly collector that is not incapacitated. The target creature becomes possessed and gains the benefits listed on its monster sheet. The harbinger can only assume control of one creature at a time. While it is assuming control, its speed becomes 0, attacking creatures have advantage, it automatically fails Strength and Dexterity saving throws, and it cannot cast any powers. If the harbinger is incapacitated, assume control ends. The harbinger can use its bonus action to end assume control. As a result, the targeted creature loses all benefits including any temporary hit points and barrier ticks.
id-00002.name: Assume Control (Costs 2 Actions)

id-00003.desc: The collector general casts a power from its list of prepared powers, using a power slot as normal.
id-00003.name: Cast a Power (Costs 3 Actions)

id-00001.desc:
Level: 0
School: Biotic
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Primed: Necrotic
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute
Range: 120 feet

Make a ranged spell attack on a creature you can see within range. On a hit, you plague the target with a persistent, damaging biotic field. The creature is primed: necrotic and takes 1d6 necrotic damage and 1d6 necrotic damage at the start of your turn while you maintain the power. If the creature dies, dark channel transfers to the nearest hostile creature within 30 feet of the target.



The damage increases by 1d6 when you reach the 5th level (2d6), 11th level (3d6) and 17th level (4d6).
id-00001.name: Dark Channel - Cantrip

id-00002.desc:
Level: 1
School: Biotic
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: 
Duration: Concentration, up to one round
Range: 90 feet

Make a ranged spell attack on a Medium or smaller creature or object within range. On a hit, you create a mass effect field around the target and it becomes lifted 5 feet in the air until the end of your next turn. While you maintain this power, as a bonus action, you can move the target up to 10 feet in any direction. If you move the target further than 90 feet away from you, the power ends and the target falls to the ground.



At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 2nd level or higher, increase the duration. 1 minute at 2nd level, 10 minutes at 3rd level, and 1 hour at 4th level.
id-00002.name: Pull - 1st level

id-00003.desc:
Level: 1
School: Biotic
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Primes: Necrotic
Duration: Instant
Range: 150 feet

Hurl an orb of dark energy at one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, you deal 2d10 necrotic damage and the target becomes primed: necrotic until the end of your next turn. The target also has disadvantage on their next attack, ability check, or saving throw. This disadvantage lasts one minute or until the target becomes incapacitated.



At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 2nd level or higher, increase the damage by 2d10 for each level above the 1st.
id-00003.name: Reave - 1st level

id-00004.desc:
Level: 1
School: Biotic
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: Detonates
Duration: Instant
Range: Self (30-feet \)

Create a cascading shockwave in a 5-foot wide by 30-foot long line originating from you. Each creature caught in the line must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d6 force damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.



At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 2d6 for each slot level above the 1st.
id-00004.name: Shockwave - 1st level

id-00005.desc:
Level: 3
School: Biotic
Casting Time: 1 action
Components: 
Duration: Concentration, up to one minute
Range: 90 feet (10-foot sphere)

Create a negative mass effect field in a 10-foot sphere at a target location within range. Each creature or object within the sphere's radius must succeed on a Strength saving throw or becomes lifted. Only Medium or smaller creature and objects are affected. Any creature or object that enters the sphere for the first time or ends its turn there must succeed on a Strength (Athletics) check or they are drawn into the sphere and become lifted. Creatures with at least 1 shield point have advantage on the Strength saving throw or Strength (Athletics) check.



At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 4th level or higher, increase the size of the sphere by 10 feet per power slot above the 3rd.
id-00005.name: Singularity - 3rd level

text.p: The collector general can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The collector general regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

id-00001.desc: The collector general is a 12th-level powercaster. Its powercasting ability is Wisdom (power save DC 16, +8 to hit with powers). The collector general has the below powers.
id-00001.name: Spellcasting

id-00002.desc: The collector general has 20 barrier ticks. When it is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00002.name: Barrier

id-00001.desc: The collector guardian makes two Collector Assault Rifle attacks.
id-00001.name: Multiattack

id-00002.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
id-00002.name: Weapon Bash

id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range (60ft/180ft), one target. Hit: 12 (4d4 + 2) piercing damage.
id-00003.name: Collector Assault Rifle (burst-fire, two-handed)

id-00004.desc: As a bonus action, the collector guardian generates a 5 feet tall and wide, hexagon-shaped shield with 5AC and 50 shield points which offers full-cover.\n\nYou can find it in the NPCs list.
id-00004.name: Hex Shield (1/Day)

id-00001.desc: The collector guardian has 2 barrier ticks. When it is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00001.name: Barrier

id-00002.desc: When the collector guardian is possessed by a harbinger it gains temporary hit points equal to its total hit points and 6 barrier ticks. While it has barrier ticks it also gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
id-00002.name: Possessed Collector

id-00003.desc: Successful ranged attacks on a target with an active barrier will strip away 2 barrier ticks and reduce the damage reduction by half. Warp ammo can detonate primed targets.
id-00003.name: Warp Ammo

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage.
id-00001.name: Claw

id-00002.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range (25ft/75ft), one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.
id-00002.name: Collector SMG (two-handed, burst-fire)

id-00003.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range (25ft/75ft), one target. Hit: The target is restrained by organic webbing. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 14 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).
id-00003.name: Collector Web

id-00001.desc:
The collector trooper has the following grenades equipped. It can use a grenade as an action.

2 uses: frag grenade III:

Target an area within 30 feet. Each creature within 10 feet of the target must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 3d12 piercing damage or half as much damage on a successful one.
id-00001.name: Grenades

id-00002.desc: The collector trooper has 2 barrier ticks. When it is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00002.name: Barrier

id-00003.desc: When the collector trooper is possessed by a harbinger it gains temporary hit points equal to its total hit points and 6 barrier ticks. While it has barrier ticks it also gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
id-00003.name: Possessed Collector

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 38 (6d10 + 5) piercing damage.
id-00001.name: Claw

id-00002.desc: The praetorian pounces to a location within 35 feet and makes a claw attack.
id-00002.name: Pounce (Recharge 5-6)

id-00003.desc: The praetorian shoots particle beams in a 30-foot line that is 10 feet wide originating from itself. Each creature within the area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 54 (12d8) radiant damage or half as much on a successful one.
id-00003.name: Twin Particle Beams (Recharge 5-6)

id-00001.desc: When targeted by a biotic power or tech power, the praetorian can use its reaction to gain 2 barrier ticks and gain resistance to force, necrotic, cold, lightning, and fire damage until the start of its next turn.
id-00001.name: Negation Barrier

id-00001.desc: The praetorian has 10 barrier ticks. When it is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00001.name: Barrier

id-00002.desc: When the praetorian is possessed by a harbinger it gains 10 barrier ticks and while it has barrier ticks it also gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. It can use its action to launch 2 missiles at a single or different target creatures within 60m. Each target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save a target takes 33 (6d10) thunder damage, or half as much on a successful one. Once the praetorian fires its missiles, it cannot do so again.
id-00002.name: Possessed Praetorian

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) poison damage and 3 (1d4 + 1) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on DC 13 Constitution saving throw or has disadvantage on its next attack roll.
id-00001.name: Plague Sting

id-00001.desc: The seeker plague has 1 barrier tick. When it is dealt damage, remove one barrier tick and reduce the damage by 1d8.
id-00001.name: Barrier

id-00001.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5ft, one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) poison damage.
id-00001.name: Sting

text.p: Asari are a species of elegant, mono-gendered humanoids. The asari resemble female humans with blue or purple skin and a crest of rigid tentacles in place of hair. Despite their feminine appearance, asari have little use for gender or gender roles, though they often use female pronouns and gendered language. They possess a unique method of reproduction initiated by a "mind meld" which links the asari's nervous system with a partner-even one of a different species-to randomize genes to create asari offspring. Asari have an innate biotic ability and don't require a biotic implant to manipulate mass effect fields.

Because of their long lifespan, asari tend to have a "long view" not common in other species. When they encounter a new species or situation, the asari are more comfortable with an extended period of passive observation and study than immediate action. They invite new species of advanced development to join the galactic community, knowing that their ideals and beliefs will inevitably influence the existing culture.

Asari reproduction is very different from other forms of sexual reproduction. When a meld for reproduction is initiated, the asari accesses her partner's genes and subconsciously uses them as an algorithmic seed to remap genes into a unique set of DNA. The offspring resulting from such interspecies pairings are always asari as no DNA is taken from the partner. Instead, the asari uses the meld to explore her partner's genetic heritage and pass desirable traits on to any offspring and as a "map" to randomize the genes of the offspring.

Asari believe that their offspring acquire the best qualities of the "father" from the melded genes. Therefore, they frown upon intraspecies conception, since genetic traits and cultural insight is gained from mating outside their species, so it's considered wasteful for asari to reproduce together. The results of such unions are occasionally referred to as "purebloods", a great insult among contemporary asari. A rare genetic defect known as Ardat-Yakshi, which makes asari destroy the partner's mind during melding, occurs much more frequently among the daughters of purebloods.

Asari pass through three climacteric life stages, marked by biochemical and physiological changes. The Maiden stage begins at puberty and is marked by the drive to explore and experience. Most young asari are curious and restless, and it is not uncommon for many to try their hand at dancing in bars or working as mercenaries during this time. The Matron stage of life begins around the age of 350, though it can be triggered earlier if the individual melds frequently. This period is marked by a desire to settle in one area and raise children. The Matriarch stage begins around 700 years of age, or earlier if the individual melds rarely. Matriarchs become active in their community as sages and councilors, dispensing wisdom from centuries of experience. Their knowledge and guidance may be one reason why Matriarchs are rarely seen outside asari space. However, each stage can be started whenever an asari feels that she has reached the correct level of maturity.

Asari are given a personal name by their parents and take the surname of their mothers, even if the child has 2 asari parents. Outside of asari communities, they normally do not use their surnames and prefer to introduce themselves with their personal name only. Matriarchs are addressed as "Matriarch" but other titles may be used for matriarchs in prestigious positions.

Personal Names: Aeian, Aethyta, Aleena, Alestia, Aria, Batha, Benezia, Dahlia, Falere, Irissa, Jona, Liara, Lidanya, Liselle, Mallene, Morinth, Nassana, Nyxeris, Pelessaria, Rana, Rila, Samara, Sarissa, Shiala, Tela, Tevos, Treeya

Surnames: Ateyne, B'Sayle, Calis, D'Layne, D'Nava, D'Ysesan, Dantius, Iallis, Iasava, Janieri, Kelis, M'Loari, M'Taros, Makenus, Nuwani, Sedela, Sederis, T'Goni, T'Loak, T'Soni, Thanoptis, Theris, V'Lanis, V'Nato, V'Tizor, Vasir
Asari are very long-lived and can reach ages of over 1000 years.
Asari are biased towards goodness, but exhibit a range of alignments not dissimilar to humans. Most Maiden stage asari are chaotic, Matrons level out to neutral, Matriarchs are heavily lawful.
Asari have builds incredibly similar to female humans. Your size is Medium.
Your walking speed is 30 ft.
You know two cantrips of your choice from the biotic spell list. You know one 1st-level spell from the biotic spell list.

As an action, you can attempt to transfer or receive thoughts from another organic creature within 5 feet. If the creature is unwilling, it must make a Wisdom saving throw equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Wisdom modifier. If it fails, you can successfully begin the meld, initially learning the surface thoughts of the creature -- what is most on its mind in that moment. If you choose a creature that has an Intelligence of 3 or lower, the creature is unaffected.

If you have an active mind meld, you can attempt to probe deeper into the creature's mind as an Action. If you do, you gain insight into its reasoning (if any), its emotional state, and something that looms large in its mind (such as something it worries over, loves, or hates). Alternatively, you may use your action to direct questions at the target creature to naturally shape the course of its thoughts.

Mind meld lasts 1 minute. An unwilling creature makes another Wisdom saving throw at the start of each of its turns. On a successful save, the meld ends. Mind meld also ends if you attempt to mind meld another creature or the creature is farther than 5 feet from you. You may also end the meld as a free action on your turn.
You may use Mind Meld a number of times between long rests equal to your Wisdom modifier (minimum 1).
Choose a subrace.
Your Wisdom score increases by 1.

The vorcha originate from Heshtok, a small, hostile, overcrowded planet which has been largely stripped of natural resources by successive generations of this fast-breeding, savage species. The lack of resources has resulted in a tight-knit, clan-based society in which rival clans wage constant war against one another for control of scarce resources. Even as their population grows, the vorcha constantly fight each other in fierce competition over basic necessities. This incessant warfare has made each generation of vorcha stronger and more aggressive than that which preceded it, but their continual lack of resources has kept vorcha society extremely primitive.

The vorcha are known for a rather unique biology: they have clusters of non-differentiated cells, similar to those found on the planarian worm of Earth. These cells allow the vorcha limited regenerative abilities, as well as the ability to adapt quickly to its environment, such as developing thicker skin after being burned or increased musculature to survive in high gravity. When a vorcha is injured or in distress, these cells move to the affected area and rapidly (~1 week) mature to specialized forms that will alleviate the issue.

Vorcha society is built around combat. In fact, the vorcha use combat, both individually and in groups, as their default form of communication. The vorcha are a clan-based people who prefer living in communal environments with others of their species to living alone or in the company of alien species. When a clan population grows too large, younger members will depart to start a new clan elsewhere. The vorcha are extremely aggressive, both against rivals of their own species and against any alien who stands in their way. Vorcha who have managed to escape their homeworld have a tendency to occupy uninhabited areas of space stations or larger spaceships.
Like their lifespans, vorcha names are brutal and short.
Male names: Besk, Drent, Dist, Flesk, Grank, Grote, Gryll, Jerst, Kreete, Shisk, Tirst, Tregg,
Female names: Ast, Brytt, Eesk, Fleeg, Ift, Ish, Keet, Kiv, Pash, Pritt, Shate, Tath
Vorcha have extremely short lifespans and only live for 20 years. They reach adulthood shortly after their first year.
Most vorcha are chaotic evil or almost always chaotic even if their morality is strengthened.
Vorcha are taller on average than humans (though they naturally slouch) and relatively slender. Your size is Medium.
Your walking speed is 40 feet.

Your fanged maw is a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.
You regain all your Hit Dice on a long rest. Additionally, if you lose a body part, the missing part will regrow and return to full functionality after a passing of time, based on the body part:

list.li: Fingers & Toes : 1 week
Hands & Feet : 2 weeks
Arm (to elbow) & Leg (to knee ): 4 weeks
Eye : 6 weeks
Arm (to shoulder) & Leg (to hip) : 8 weeks

text.p: You are immune to disease. In addition, you have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage to your hit points.
Your Dexterity score increases by 2. Your Constitution score increases by 1.
Your cells allow you to adapt to harsh environments. Choose one minor and major adaptation of the same environment and gain both benefits..

You may gain additional adaptations if you spend the requisite amount of time in an environment. To gain the benefit, you must spend more than fifty percent of your time within the environment with little to no protection. At your GM’s discretion, you can gain additional adaptations at a faster rate or at character creation.

Drell are omnivorous reptile-like humanoids with dense muscle tissue, giving them a wiry strength. Their skin is infused with a venom mild enough to be served in drinks and may cause mild hallucinations on oral contact. Drell also possess eidetic memory, an adaptation to a world where they must remember the location of every necessary resource across vast distances. The memories are so strong that an external stimulus can trigger a powerful memory recall and these recalls are so vivid and detailed that some drell may mistake it for reality.

The drell ancestors emerged from dry, rocky deserts on the barren world of Rakhana. Eight centuries ago, the already-arid drell homeworld began its swift descent into lifelessness due to disastrous industrial expansion. At the time, the drell lacked interstellar flight capacity, and with their population bursting at eleven billion, they faced certain doom.

It was around the 1980s CE that the hanar made first contact with the drell species. In the following ten years, the hanar would transport a total of 375,000 drell to the hanar homeworld, Kahje. The remaining billions left on Rakhana would perish on their dying planet, warring against each other for diminishing resources.

The debt of gratitude that the drell owe the hanar is referred to as the Compact, which the drell fulfill by taking on tasks that the hanar find difficult, such as combat. Any drell may refuse to serve, but as being requested to serve is a great honor, few turn down the offer. Some drell grow a close, personal relationship with the hanar, so much so that the hanar will even tell the drell their "soul name". Drell have adapted to communication with hanar by getting implants in their eyes to allow them to observe the bioluminescence the hanar use for communication.

Most drell are deeply religious, believing that they have souls separate from their bodies. They see death as a departure from the body, and they also state that a person's body and soul form a Whole. When the soul is traumatized or otherwise disrupted, or the body is ill or injured, a person is no longer Whole. They also believe that their body can be directed as a separate entity from themselves, thus, some drell take no responsibility when executing an order given by the hanar even if the order is an assassination.
The religion includes at least three gods which drell often pray to for guidance and protection:
Amonkira, Lord of Hunters
Arashu, Goddess of Motherhood and Protection
Kalahira, Goddess of Oceans and Afterlife.
Drell use given and family names.
Male Names: Chas, Drino, Hite, Hoskim, Lofo, Massa, Neta, Nitos, Ruyim, Tako, Tayu, Thane, Tumil, Yesit
